title: Teknologi tepat guna

description.value: Database of applied technology for small and medium-sized enterprises in Indonesia.

notes.value:
Title from disc label.

System requirements: PC with Pentium MMX 166 Mhz processor; 32 MB RAM; 100 MB free harddisk space; Windows 9x or 2000; VGA monitor and VGA graphics card, high color, 16 bits; 8x CD-ROM or DVD-ROM drive; Internet Explorer.
